long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your add-on for Anonymous & Private Internet.

anonymoX enables you to …

✔ Browse the web anonymously
✔ Change your IP address & country (to one provided by us) 
✔ Visit blocked & censored websites
✔ Appear to surf from another country


– Short summary of its functionality –

Instead of accessing a website directly, it will be first opened by one of our servers, called a Proxy.
This Proxy hides your true internet identity and makes it look as if not you, but the Proxy is currently visiting the website.

anonymoX is more than just an extension. The actual anonymization and country faking is done by an anonymization network. It consists of many servers, in every country of your country list. These servers are provided and managed by us.
If you use anonymoX's anonymization network without paying, that is only possible because you indirectly participate in the server funding by viewing advertisements.

For ad-free and unrestricted usage of the anonymization network and the Add-On, you need anonymoX Premium.

If correct functionality and best anonymity is very important to you, please check  https://anonymox.net/en/guideline-for-proper-use-chrome


– anonymoX Premium –

Upgrade to Premium for more features like:
    - Faster surfing (up to 16Mbits)
    - More than 170 IPs from over 14 countries
    - Unlimited Download Volume
    - No ads

–  SafeShop is now built into Anonymox, enhancing your online shopping experience with security and privacy. – 
Anonymox with Safeshop built in was designed to keep you secure while you shop, you can confidently browse and purchase from your favorite online stores.
SafeShop - Shop Smart, Shop Safe

Protect your online shopping experience with SafeShop, the ultimate browser extension designed to keep you secure while you shop. With SafeShop, you can confidently browse and purchase from your favorite online stores, knowing that your transactions are safe and your personal information is protected. Here’s how SafeShop helps you shop smarter and safer:

Key Features:
1. Google Safe Browsing Integration: Automatically checks websites against Google's Safe Browsing database to ensure they are safe before you shop. Check examples at https://anonymox.net/safeshop
2. SSL Verification: Confirms that the website uses SSL (Secure Socket Layer) encryption, ensuring your transaction and personal data are secure.
Authenticity Verification: Ensures that the shopping website is genuine and trustworthy, protecting you from counterfeit and fraudulent sites.
3. Affiliate Platform API Integration: Leverages multiple affiliate platform APIs to verify that the website has an authenticated affiliate ID, adding an extra layer of security.
4. Checkout Verification Pop-Up: At checkout, SafeShop provides a verification pop-up to notify you that the site is secure and authenticated, so you can complete your purchase with peace of mind.

SafeShop is seamlessly integrated with websites such as A Gentleman's Lifestyle, ensuring that when you click on a link from our website, you're guaranteed a safe shopping experience. Shop with confidence knowing that SafeShop has verified the security and authenticity of your chosen site.

Why Choose SafeShop?

Enhanced Security: Protects your personal and payment information from potential threats.

Peace of Mind: Shop confidently knowing the sites you visit are safe and legitimate.

Seamless Experience: Enjoy a smooth and secure shopping experience without any extra steps.

Support Your Favorite Site: By using SafeShop, you also support A Gentleman's Lifestyle through verified affiliate links.

How It Works:
1. Install Anonymox with SafeShop: Add the extension to your Chrome browser.
2. Browse and Shop: Visit your favorite online stores.
3. Get Notified: Receive real-time notifications about the safety and authenticity of the site.
4. Shop Securely: Proceed with your purchase knowing your transaction is secure.

You now have lifetime free VPN and security, plus lifetime protection for your shopping with SafeShop. Enjoy unparalleled privacy and safety for all your online activities!
For more information go to https://anonymox.net/safeshop/
